pages.text: The $(mob)Pirate$() is a variant of the $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeleton$() that spawns in $(thing)Pirate Ships$(). Unlike normal $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeletons$() it doesn't burn in sunlight and may wield an $(item)Iron Sword$() instead of a $(item)Bow$().$(p)Each $(thing)Pirate Ship$() has a captain that wears armor, wields a $(item)Diamond Sword$() and has a $(l:minecraft_parrot)$(mob)Parrot$() on its shoulder.
$(mob)Pirates$() may drop a $(item)Pirate Hat$() on death. It can be worn as weak, but stylish armor.
